attributes.action: Get a new female hostel in Belfast for women with alcohol and drug addiction
attributes.additional_details: Because the one we have is closing down and our homeless females will be on the street if something isn't done these are someones Granny mother or daughter
attributes.background: I want them to look and debate this because homeless services wasn't designed for females it about time we did something about this and female homeless  is on the rise I see it ever week with my own eye

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
